Bash(powershell.exe -Command "cd ''C:\\Users\\pisel\\Desktop\\Guloi\\Ascoli_View_Elections''; python -c ""
import json
with open\(''data/json/2009_Comunali/preferenze_comunali.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)

total = 0
for party in data[''liste'']:
    count = len\(party[''candidati'']\)
    print\(f''{party[""nome""]}: {count} candidates''\)
    total += count

print\(f''\\nTotal: {total} candidates across {len\(data[""liste""]\)} parties''\)
""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "cd ''C:\\Users\\pisel\\Desktop\\Guloi\\Ascoli_View_Elections''; python -c ""
import json
f=open\(''data/json/2009_Comunali/preferenze_comunali.json'',''r'',encoding=''utf-8''\)
d=json.load\(f\)
errors=0
for p in d[''liste'']:
    for c in p[''candidati'']:
        s=sum\(c[''sezioni''].values\(\)\)
        if s != c[''totale'']:
            errors+=1
print\(''Validation errors:'', errors\)
print\(''Status:'', ''PASS'' if errors==0 else ''FAIL''\)
""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "cd ''C:\\Users\\pisel\\Desktop\\Guloi\\Ascoli_View_Elections''; python -c ""
import json
import os

files = [
    ''data/json/2009_Comunali/ballottaggio_sindaco.json'',
    ''data/json/2009_Comunali/primo_turno_sindaco.json'',
    ''data/json/2009_Comunali/liste_consiglio.json'',
    ''data/json/2009_Comunali/preferenze_comunali.json'',
    ''data/json/2009_Europee/preferenze_europee.json''
]

for f in files:
    if os.path.exists\(f\):
        with open\(f, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as file:
            d = json.load\(file\)
            print\(f''{f}:''\)
            print\(f''  Keys: {list\(d.keys\(\)\)}''\)
            if ''candidati'' in d:
                print\(f''  Candidati: {len\(d[""candidati""]\)}''\)
            if ''liste'' in d:
                print\(f''  Liste: {len\(d[""liste""]\)}''\)
            print\(\)
""")
